title: Himi 215
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Pea ke mau tupu hake,
‘I he ‘Afiona;
‘I he me’a kotoa pē,
Ko ho finangalo:
2.
Ke ‘oua ke mau lava’i,
‘I he ‘Afiona;
Ke mau ‘ata’atāina,
Pea haohaoa.
3.
Pea ka hokosi lelei,
‘A e fu’u ngāue ni,
Ke ō hake ki hēvani,
Homau laumālie.
4.
Ke mau ma’u homau tofi’a
Mo e kakai ma’a,
‘O taau mo e kau polo’i,
Ki he ‘Afiona. *
